original_text: There were also many women there. They were standing a long way away and they were watching these events. They had come with Jesus from Galilee to help him.
korean_text: 예수를 섬기며 갈릴리에서부터 따라온 많은 여자가 거기 있어 멀리서 바라보고 있으니

sentences.original_text: There were also many women there
They were standing a long way away
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아주 먼 곳에 서 있었다

sentences.original_text: and they were watching these events
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 이 일들을 지켜보고 있었다

sentences.original_text: They had come with Jesus from Galilee
